remarks:
Deduction form of ~ dvelimf .  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-May-2018.) 

---

 Deduction form of ~ dvelimf .  This version may be useful if we want to avoid ~ ax-17 and use ~ ax-16 instead.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-May-2018.)
statement:
dvelimdf.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
dvelimdf.2 $e |- F/ z ph $.
dvelimdf.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ps ) $.
dvelimdf.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/ z ch ) $.
dvelimdf.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( z = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
dvelimdf $p |- ( ph -> ( -. A. x x = y -> F/ x ch ) ) $.
